ALL Present.description: CRITICAL ALERT: The AI has detected signs of multiple severe infections or pest infestations simultaneously on the same plant.
ALL Present.treatment: Plants with multiple severe infections rarely recover. Uproot and burn affected plants away from the field. Consult an extension officer immediately.
ALL Present.chemical_control: Apply a broad-spectrum cocktail only under expert guidance.
ALL Present.preventive_measures: Implement strict crop rotation next season and use certified treated seeds.
ALL Present.weather_warning: High humidity accelerates infections. Do not spray if rain is expected within 3 hours.

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.description: Gray Leaf Spot is a fungal disease causing tan-to-gray rectangular lesions on the leaves, reducing grain yield.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.treatment: Remove crop residue from the previous season. Apply a foliar fungicide at the early tasseling stage.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.chemical_control: Use systemic fungicides to halt the fungal spread.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.preventive_measures: Plant resistant hybrid varieties next season and practice deep plowing.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.weather_warning: Thrives in high humidity. Spray early in the morning when dew has dried.

Corn___Common_Rust_early.description: Early stage Common Rust appears as small, reddish-brown pustules on the leaves.
Corn___Common_Rust_early.treatment: Because it is in the early stage, the crop can be saved easily. Apply a preventative and curative fungicide.
Corn___Common_Rust_early.preventive_measures: Ensure plants have adequate spacing for airflow.
Corn___Common_Rust_early.weather_warning: Do not spray if temperature is above 30°C to avoid burning the leaves.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_severe.description: Severe Common Rust. Leaves are heavily covered in brown, powdery spores, causing premature drying. Yield loss is highly likely.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_severe.treatment: Immediate application of strong systemic fungicides is required. Strip off and destroy heavily infected bottom leaves.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_severe.chemical_control: A mixture of systemic and contact fungicides is required.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_severe.preventive_measures: Plant rust-resistant maize varieties next season.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_severe.weather_warning: Spores spread rapidly in wind. Spray immediately on a calm, dry day.

Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight_early.description: Early stage Northern Leaf Blight (NLB) shows large, cigar-shaped, grayish-green or tan lesions.
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight_early.treatment: Fungicide application is highly effective at this early stage. Apply immediately.
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight_early.chemical_control: Use targeted fungicides before lesions reach the ear leaf.
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight_early.preventive_measures: Control weeds that may harbor the fungus.

maize fall armyworm.description: Fall Armyworm (FAW) is a highly destructive caterpillar that feeds inside the maize funnel, causing ragged holes.
maize fall armyworm.treatment: Direct chemical sprays directly into the funnel (whorl). For organic, put fine sand/ash mixed with pepper into the funnel.
maize fall armyworm.chemical_control: Use localized systemic or contact insecticides. Rotate chemicals to prevent resistance.
maize fall armyworm.preventive_measures: Practice 'Push-Pull' technology using Desmodium and Napier grass.
maize fall armyworm.weather_warning: Spray early morning (6 AM - 9 AM) or late evening when caterpillars feed.

Corn___Healthy_.description: Your maize plant looks perfectly healthy! The leaves are green and free from pests.
Corn___Healthy_.treatment: No disease treatment is required. Continue good agronomic practices.
Corn___Healthy_.active_ingredient: N/A - Top dress with CAN or Urea if required.
Corn___Healthy_.preventive_measures: Continue regular scouting twice a week.
Corn___Healthy_.weather_warning: Monitor weather for optimal fertilizer application.

ALL Present.description: HATARI: Mtambo umegundua dalili za magonjwa mabaya au wadudu wengi kwa wakati mmoja kwenye mmea mmoja.
ALL Present.treatment: Mimea iliyo na maambukizi haya mara chache hupona. Ng'oa na choma mimea iliyoathiriwa mbali na shamba. Wasiliana na afisa wa kilimo mara moja.
ALL Present.chemical_control: Tumia mchanganyiko wa dawa chini ya ushauri wa mtaalamu pekee.
ALL Present.active_ingredient: Inahitaji Ushauri wa Mtaalamu wa Kilimo
ALL Present.preventive_measures: Fanya mzunguko wa mazao (crop rotation) msimu ujao na utumie mbegu zilizothibitishwa.
ALL Present.weather_warning: Unyevu mwingi huharakisha maambukizi. Usipige dawa ikiwa mvua inatarajiwa ndani ya saa 3.

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.description: Ugonjwa wa Madoa ya Kijivu (Gray Leaf Spot) husababisha madoa ya kahawia kwenye majani na kupunguza mavuno.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.treatment: Ondoa mabaki ya mazao ya msimu uliopita. Piga dawa ya ukungu (fungicide) wakati mmea unaanza kutoa mbelewele.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.chemical_control: Tumia dawa zinazoingia ndani ya mmea kuzuia ukungu kusambaa.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.preventive_measures: Panda mbegu zinazostahimili magonjwa msimu ujao.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.weather_warning: Hustawi kwenye unyevu mwingi. Piga dawa asubuhi umande ukikauka.

Corn___Common_Rust_early.description: Hatua ya mapema ya Ugonjwa wa Kutu (Rust) huonekana kama vijidudu vidogo vya rangi ya kahawia/kutu kwenye majani.
Corn___Common_Rust_early.treatment: Kwa kuwa ni hatua ya mapema, mmea unaweza kuokolewa kwa urahisi. Piga dawa ya kuzuia na kutibu ukungu.
Corn___Common_Rust_early.chemical_control: Piga dawa ya kuzuia mara moja ili kulinda majani mengine.
Corn___Common_Rust_early.preventive_measures: Hakikisha mimea imeachana nafasi ya kutosha kuruhusu hewa kupita.
Corn___Common_Rust_early.weather_warning: Usipige dawa ikiwa joto linazidi 30°C ili kuepuka kuunguza majani.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_severe.description: Ugonjwa wa Kutu uliozidi. Majani yamefunikwa na unga wa kahawia, na kusababisha majani kukauka haraka. Hasara ya mavuno ni kubwa.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_severe.treatment: Dawa kali inayozunguka ndani ya mmea inahitajika haraka. Ondoa na uchome majani ya chini yaliyoathirika sana.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_severe.chemical_control: Mchanganyiko wa dawa ya mguso na inayoingia ndani ya mmea inahitajika.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_severe.preventive_measures: Panda mbegu zinazostahimili ugonjwa wa kutu msimu ujao.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_severe.weather_warning: Vijidudu husambaa haraka kwa upepo. Piga dawa siku tulivu isiyo na upepo.

Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight_early.description: Hatua ya mapema ya Blight huonyesha madoa makubwa ya kijivu au kahawia yanayofanana na sigara.
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight_early.treatment: Kupiga dawa ya ukungu katika hatua hii ni muhimu sana. Piga dawa mara moja.
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight_early.chemical_control: Tumia dawa za ukungu kabla madoa hayajafika kwenye jani la mhindi.
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight_early.preventive_measures: Dhibiti magugu ambayo yanaweza kuficha ukungu.
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight_early.weather_warning: Piga dawa asubuhi isiyo na mvua.

maize fall armyworm.description: Kiwavi Jeshi (Fall Armyworm) ni mdudu mharibifu sana anayekula ndani ya mrija wa mhindi na kutoboa matundu kwenye majani.
maize fall armyworm.treatment: Elekeza dawa moja kwa moja ndani ya mrija (funnel) wa mmea. Kwa kilimo hai, weka mchanga/majivu yaliyochanganywa na pilipili ndani ya mrija.
maize fall armyworm.chemical_control: Tumia dawa za wadudu. Badilisha aina za dawa ili wadudu wasizoee.
maize fall armyworm.preventive_measures: Tumia mbinu ya 'Sukuma-Vuta' (Push-Pull) ukitumia Desmodium na nyasi za Napier.
maize fall armyworm.weather_warning: Piga dawa asubuhi na mapema (Saa 12 - Saa 3) au jioni wadudu wanapotoka kula.

Corn___Healthy_.description: Mhindi wako unaonekana una afya nzuri sana! Majani ni ya kijani na hayana magonjwa wala wadudu.
Corn___Healthy_.treatment: Hakuna matibabu yanayohitajika. Endelea na huduma nzuri za shambani.
Corn___Healthy_.active_ingredient: Weka mbolea ya kukuzia (CAN au Urea) ikiwa udongo unahitaji.
Corn___Healthy_.preventive_measures: Endelea kukagua shamba lako mara mbili kwa wiki.
Corn___Healthy_.weather_warning: Fuatilia hali ya hewa kabla ya kuweka mbolea (weka wakati udongo una unyevu).
